name: Perkdice: Loopy Zoopy
description:
Perkdice is a game made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam

Shoot robots, and get to the end of a loop for a random perk!

Perks stack, and you can't choose what you get... it could even be a downgrade...

Design & Art by Dwerg

Programming by Aniraster

Moral support by Friends
